scripts.build:cjs: rollup src/index.ts -o dist/index.js -f cjs -c & rollup src/index.ts -o dist/index.min.js -f cjs -c -p terser
scripts.build:umd: rollup src/index.ts -o dist/yformula.js -n yformula -f umd -c & rollup src/index.ts -o dist/yformula.min.js -n yformula -f umd -c -p terser
scripts.test:operation: rollup test/operation.mjs -o test/operation.js -f cjs -c & node test/operation.js
scripts.test:parser: rollup test/parser.mjs -o test/parser.js -f cjs -c & node test/parser.js
scripts.test:performance: rollup test/performance.mjs -o test/performance.js -f cjs -c & node test/performance.js
